text: (tavada) “matat vada oba gaurava kala mohuva oba avadhanaya kalehida?”yi (adamva itamat pahat lesa genahæra dakvamin) “oba mava viniscaya dina dakva pramada kara hæriyahot, itamat sulutarayak hæra, mohuge paramparave daruvan siyallanvama ma margaya værada yamata salasva (mulin uputa) harinnemi” yayi pævasuveya
